TopicTitle: How many screenshots do you have?

Articles.Content: In my current game, which stretched from 0.19.1 to now, I have 1107 screenshots. Including 0.19 and 0.18.4, I have a total of 1652 screenshots. That's not counting the amount I have on my old laptop, too.
Two words. Too many.
Thousands.
I only have nineteen screenshots. I don't see the point in taking the shot unless I am doing something I've never done before.
Over all?! I don't even want to try to count them. .20.2 I have 34.
Eleventy-six and a half.

I only have nineteen screenshots. I don't see the point in taking the shot unless I am doing something I've never done before.

Then you're probably not a (real world) photographer. I used to do paid photography on the side, covering events (and this was back in the film age). You have to take several shots of a scene, esp. a fast one, in rapid progression, if only to make sure you get the "right" one. It's a lot easier now, in the digital age, because you don't need to buy rolls and rolls of film! You get to select from several frames on which ones are the best. Having covered some weddings, this technique can really shine, esp. in intimate moments like the couple eating their cake, and also in sports, capturing those moments on the finish line, etc. Same thing with KSP's screenshot button--I make it a point to take 5 screenshots in rapid succession, while I'm doing a critical and memorable moment like landing or insertion to orbit--always nice if you have a set of photos to choose from.
97,at least one per successful mission.
27 screenshots. mostly of mechs...

Two words. Too many.

I count four

Then you're probably not a (real world) photographer.

You caught me, I am not a photographer. I was born in the digital age where cameras use Memory cards instead of film.

From your description it sounds like photography is the right career path for someone with OCD.

From your description it sounds like photography is the right career path for someone with OCD.

LOL as a matter of fact, I do have some professional photographer friends who kinda have OCD, so that statement is funny

Far more than I really need.

I sometimes entertain hopes of writing mission reports, so I try to screenshot everything of note in every mission. Then I never do anything productive with them, although it does make for a nice wallpaper roll on my laptop.
777, with more in the built-in screenshots folder.
Very few, because I like to go through my folders often and tidy everything up.
I have 1,146 screenshots, going all the way back to a few days after the release of 0.15.... I tend to take quite a bit of them..
34, I keep them tidy.

I count four

Wiseguy.
1,131... Holy crap, when did that happen?

Like: 30.

(10charsbm,ckbcd )
A couple thousand, but with each mission I cull a few favorite images into my KSP theme folder, which cycles as my desktop background... Yeah... My computer's desktop theme is KSP!
